summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 GMC ENVOY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT BOTH THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER HEADLIGHTS FAILED TO WORK WITHOUT WARNING. THE DEALER (COURTESY BUICK GMC LAFAYETTE LOCATED AT 4750 JOHNSTON ST, LAFAYETTE, LA 70506; (337) 504-7342) WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THE DEALER WOULD NOT WORK WITH VEHICLES OVER TEN YEARS OLD. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 888-988-7267 AND STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY AND EXCEEDED THE MILEAGE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 151,000.
